meanings.definition: The quality or state of being disgraceful or shameful.
meanings.sent1: His opprobriousness was evident to everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The opprobriousness of his actions left a lasting impact on his reputation.
meanings.sent3: Despite his opprobriousness, he tried to redeem himself by apologizing.
meanings.sent4: The opprobriousness of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over them.
meanings.sent5: The opprobriousness of the crime was unforgivable in the eyes of the community.

meanings.definition: Behavior that is deserving of scorn or criticism.
meanings.sent1: Her opprobriousness towards her colleagues made it difficult to work with her.
meanings.sent2: The manager's opprobriousness towards his employees created a toxic work environment.
meanings.sent3: His opprobriousness towards the new project was met with eye rolls from the team.
meanings.sent4: The opprobriousness of his behavior was like a red flag to everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The opprobriousness of her attitude was a barrier to building positive relationships.
